long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Never forget to cc Evie again! The Evie Chrome extension for GMail adds a handy button in GMail that will automatically put Evie in cc and add a sentence to your email that introduces Evie - with a single click.
